Control.Name: Button_TrackDebuffs
Control.Tooltip: Changes HP bar color if party-member has a dispellable debuff

Control.Name: Button_MouseOverSelection
Control.Tooltip: Automatically targets the player you are hovering over if that player is in-range

Control.Name: Button_RememberPrevTarget
Control.Tooltip: Automatically returns to your previous target when you are no longer hovering over any bars. Requires "Target on MouseOver" to be enabled.

Control.Name: Button_DisableMentoring
Control.Tooltip: If checked, you will no longer receive the option to mentor players that are below your level. This affects raid groups as well.
